name: Awesome Candy Fair Carnival Sweet Food Dessert Maker
name_original: Awesome Candy Fair Carnival Sweet Food Dessert Maker
description:
Who's ready for this 5 in 1 Carnival Food making fun!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best 5 in 1 candy carnival cooking and baking game with all of your favorite food recipes. Play and make your own today!

Different Makers:
- Cotton Candy
- Candy Apples
- Chocolate Bars
- Crispy Rice Treats
- Lollipops
- Peanut Butter Cups
- Jello!!!

Features:
- Choose your flavor
- Choose your sticks, wrappers, etc
- Decorate with many toppings
- Cooking Simulator based on maker game
- Touch to EAT EAT EAT!

Play it for yourself. Make your treats today!

Download Awesome Candy Fair Carnival Sweet Food Dessert Maker right now and have fun making and cooking!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Candy Fair Carnival Sweet Food Dessert Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
